title: The minimum width of a corridor shall not be less than 75 cm
clause_text: The minimum width of a corridor shall not be less than 75 cm. in the case of 2 storeys row housing residential buildings and 100 cm. in the case of other buildings and actual width shall be calculated based on the provision of Regulations No.9.28.3 to 9.28.8 (both inclusive)

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The minimum width of a corridor shall not be less than 75 cm. in the case of 2 storeys row housing residential buildings and 100 cm. in the case of other buildings and actual width shall be calculated
